definitions.text: (usually preceded by `in') a detail or point
the condition of being honored (esteemed or respected or well regarded)
examples: a man who has earned high regard

definitions.text: an attitude of admiration or esteem
examples: she lost all respect for him

definitions.text: a courteous expression (by word or deed) of esteem or regard
examples: his deference to her wishes was very flattering
be sure to give my respects to the dean

definitions.text: behavior intended to please your parents
examples: their children were never very strong on obedience
he went to law school out of respect for his father's wishes

definitions.text: a feeling of friendship and esteem
examples: she mistook his manly regard for love
out of respect for his privacy
